siteMetadata.title: Shopify Liquid code examples
siteMetadata.slogan: Build and customize themes faster with component based Liquid examples

markdownRemark.html:
1. Add the following code to the product-template.liquid section, just below the product title.
  2. Depending on your theme, ensure that the SKU updates dynamically when you select other variants. If not, then you will need to add a few lines of JavaScript to your theme's JavaScript file.
{%- assign current_variant = product.selected_or_first_available_variant -%}
<span>{{ current_variant.sku }}</span>

frontmatter.title: Show product SKU
frontmatter.desc: Stock keeping units (SKUs) are used to identify products and track inventory. You can display the unique SKU for a product and its variants on the product page.
